recipes.title: Veggie Stew
recipes.method: 1. Pre-heat the oven to 200C/3C/gas 2.Add the rest of the ingredients and mix well. 3.Place the mixture in a large bowl and cover with a lid. 4.Place the lid on the oven and cook for 40 minutes. 5.Place the carrot, leek and tofu in a large bowl. Add the stock and mix well. 6.Serve with a slaw of your choice

recipes.title: Veggie Pizza
recipes.method: 1. Pre-heat the oven to 200C/3C/gas 5. Add the pasata, green pepper and mushrooms to the base. Place the lid on the oven and cook for 30 minutes. 5. Serve with a slaw of your choice

recipes.title: Maggie
recipes.method: 1.Boil Water , 2.Add maggie masala ,3. Add maggie , 4.Cook for 5-10 min, 5.Serve it

recipes.method: Crack an egg in a bowl, add vegetables,spices,herbs in it.....
